decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the "combo" strategy of reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard. The deck includes various cards that enable this strategy, such as Exhume, Unearth, and Deadly Dispute. It also includes cards that allow you to discard or sacrifice creatures, such as Faithless Looting, Makeshift Munitions, and Shred Memory. The deck focuses on using cheap creatures like Putrid Goblin and Skirk Prospector to generate resources and enable the reanimation process. Additionally, the deck includes lands that can produce different types of mana to support its color requirements.
